availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John J. Roach (Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant.)

body.p: Trigg County, Kentucky, merchant. Virginia native. Son of C. W. Roach and Frances A. Roach. Married to Camilla P. Roach. Father of James M. Roach and Robert Roach. Merchant in Trigg County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, District 1, p. 291A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Cadiz, p. 155.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States(1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Trigg County, Roaring Springs Precinct, p. 40.
